alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Jim Hogg; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kenedy, southeastern Jim Hogg, north central Starr and Brooks Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Santa Elena, or 8 miles south of Agua Nueva, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Falfurrias, Agua Nueva, La Gloria, Santa Catarina, San Rafael Ranch Airport, Santa Elena, Cantu Addition, Diamond O Ranch Airport, Puesta Del Sol Airport and Hidalgo City Park. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 712 and 726. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Deep South Texas.
